attributes.action: End the practice of high speed convoys with large number of police cars and motorbikes ignoring the Highway code
attributes.additional_details:
How can the Authorities justify the large number of police vehicles and police officers deployed in these high speed convoys?

Does the Highway Code apply to everyone?

Does the Speed Limit apply to everyone including the police?

What about the need for conserving  fuel?

What happens  if these high speed convoys are caught on Speed Cameras, Who pays the fines?
How many points on their licences  have officers involved in these convoys accumulated on their licences for using excessive speed?
